name: wordpress-mcp
description: Control WordPress through Claude - manage content, edit templates, handle WooCommerce, all with natural language! The first WordPress integration with personality.

required.name: WP_APP_PASSWORD
required.placeholder: xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx

capabilities.name: WordPress Management
capabilities.description: Create, update, delete posts and pages

capabilities.name: Template Editing
capabilities.description: Edit theme files with automatic backups

capabilities.name: System Monitoring
capabilities.description: Check site health and system information

wordpress: 1. Install the WordPress plugin from wp-mcp-plugin folder
2. Activate 'WordPress MCP Integration' in WordPress admin
3. Go to Users → Your Profile → Application Passwords
4. Create a new Application Password named 'Claude MCP'
5. Copy the generated password (format: xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx)
configuration: 1. Enter your WordPress site URL (with https://)
3. Paste the Application Password from step 5 above
4. Test connection with: 'Show me my WordPress posts'

troubleshooting.connection_failed: Verify your site URL includes https:// and has no trailing slash
troubleshooting.authentication_error: Regenerate Application Password and ensure correct username
troubleshooting.tools_not_showing: Restart Claude Desktop and start a new conversation
troubleshooting.rate_limit: Increase RATE_LIMIT in configuration or wait 60 seconds

examples.prompt: Create a blog post about AI and creativity
examples.description: Creates a new WordPress post with AI-generated content

examples.prompt: Fix the typo in my header template
examples.description: Edits theme files with automatic backup
